name: composer require php/awesome
tagline: for those that love PHP and Composer
body:
![composer require shirt](http://vangogh.teespring.com/shirt_pic/2207987/2334254/7/2238/756x900/front.jpg?v=2015-04-18-17-04)

If you love coding with PHP, i'm willing to bet 70% of that is because of composer.

Now is your chance to show your love for php and composer with this awesome shirt!

Not only that, you will be teaching everyone the proper install instructions for every package out there, as well as keeping the @dohmsraken at bay.

## Get yours now!

* Get it from [Teespring](http://l.doh.ms/require-awesome-shirt) (US Based)
* Get it from [Fabrily](http://l.doh.ms/require-awesome-shirt-eu) (EU Based)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
